lead_paragraph: PECK--Norman L. The Board and staff of St. Ann's Warehouse mourn the loss of Norman Peck, our wise and generous friend and patron. Norman will be greatly missed. We extend our deepest love and sympathies to his wife Liliane and his children. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PECK, NORMAN L

snippet: PECK--Norman L. The Board and staff of St. Ann's Warehouse mourn the loss of Norman Peck, our wise and generous friend and patron. Norman will be greatly missed. We extend our deepest love and sympathies to his wife Liliane and his children. 1/3
